title: ARTS DISTRICT LAND - a new kind of urban tour
desc: Calling all Urban Explorers! Join us for a new Pop-Up Adventure Tour to explore LA?s vibrant Arts? District. Led by local experts, you?ll participate in activities that will challenge and inspire you both? physically and mentally, while learning about the secrets and spirit of the neighborhood. ? On this 4-hour bicycle tour*, you?ll discover a secret passage to the LA River, climb indoor boulders? with out a harness, and get creative at the American Apparel factory. You?ll also learn about the latest? outdoor murals from renowned artists, and tour the famous Angel City Brewery.** ? Tour price includes a limited run of the Arts District? M ojo Map ($10 retail)? handmade by? local artist Daniel Ray Everett? (www.DanRayEverett.com), r ock climbing gear and climb time, and a beer at Angel City Brewery ? This adventure will give you the opportunity to shake up your routine and unlock your inner Mojo?that? special charm that shines when we step outside of our comfort zone! ? *Tour guests are invited to bring their own bicycle or bikes can be rented a short bike ride from the tour start at DTLA Bikes (http://www.dtlabikes.com/). **Guests must be 21 years of age or over
